suggestions.original: To improve the color contrast in the artwork, consider using darker shades for the outlines of the characters and the mountains to make them stand out more against the green background. Additionally, incorporating more contrasting colors for the characters' clothing, such as using complementary colors, can enhance the visual impact. For example, using a darker blue for the pants and a more vibrant orange for the hats can create a more striking contrast. Also, adding some highlights or shadows to the characters and background elements can add depth and make the scene more dynamic.
